about_the_game:
Foxnox is a platformer where you will explore this strange world as a little fox, it's dangerous but there are some shiny items left. Can you get them?

Features

- Explore: Levels are not defined, it's just a big world.
- Collect items: The items will give you tools to deal with problems you will encounter. Go through walls, walk through walls, jump multiple times...
- Expand the world: You goal is getting new floppy disks to unlock new areas in the world.
- Get a higher punctuation: You can get the same floppy disks multiple times. The better you do the more points you will get!
detailed_description:
Foxnox is a platformer where you will explore this strange world as a little fox, it's dangerous but there are some shiny items left. Can you get them?

Features

- Explore: Levels are not defined, it's just a big world.
- Collect items: The items will give you tools to deal with problems you will encounter. Go through walls, walk through walls, jump multiple times...
- Expand the world: You goal is getting new floppy disks to unlock new areas in the world.
- Get a higher punctuation: You can get the same floppy disks multiple times. The better you do the more points you will get!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: opengl 3.0 support or higher

name: Foxnox

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: opengl 3.0 support or higher
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Explore the world as a little fox. Be careful, this adventure will not be easy!
